name: Forms: 3rd-Party Resend Gravity Forms
author: zaus

sections.description: Allows you to resend a Gravity Forms saved entry to its 3rdparty service endpoint with Forms 3rdparty Integration.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip/upload plugin folder to your plugins directory (/wp-content/plugins/)
  2. Make sure Forms 3rdparty Integration is installed and settings have been saved at least once.
  3. Activate this plugin
  4. Navigate to GF entry management list /wp-admin/admin.php?page=gf_entries.
  5. Choose an entry — either resend via quick links (hover, appears beneath) or from edit page
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Unzip/upload plugin folder to your plugins directory (/wp-content/plugins/)
  2. Make sure Forms 3rdparty Integration is installed and settings have been saved at least once.
  3. Activate this plugin
  4. Navigate to GF entry management list /wp-admin/admin.php?page=gf_entries.
  5. Choose an entry — either resend via quick links (hover, appears beneath) or from edit page

It doesn’t work right…

Drop an issue at https://github.com/zaus/forms-3rdparty-resend-gf.

short_description: Resend Gravity Forms submissions to 3rdparty service when updating entries.
description: Allows you to resend a Gravity Forms saved entry to its 3rdparty service endpoint with Forms 3rdparty Integration.
